# VTE â€” Virtual Test Engineer

Description: Agent to create test cases, validation steps, and test documentation.

Usage:
- Run `tools/agent-register.sh vte` to show `agent.yml` for registration.
- Or copy `.github/agents/vte/prompt.md` into the Copilot agent UI.

Files:
- `prompt`: `.github/agents/vte/prompt.md`
- `templates`: `.github/agents/vte/templates/`
- `snippets`: `.github/agents/vte/snippets/vte_snippets.code-snippets`

Notes:
- Run `./tools/validate-agents.js` after editing prompts.
